org.corfudb.infrastructure.orchestrator.workflows

Class AddNodeWorkflow

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.corfudb.infrastructure.orchestrator.workflows.AddNodeWorkflow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IWorkflow
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HealNodeWorkflow

    @NotThreadSafe
public class AddNodeWorkflow
extends Object
implements IWorkflow
    A definition of a workflow that adds a new node to the cluster. This workflow has almost no retry logic, therefore errors can result in its failure and the the client is responsible to ensure that it has completed by restarting the workflow.
    Author:
    Maithem

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  AddNodeWorkflow.BootstrapNode
      Bootstrap the new node to be added to the cluster, or ignore bootstrap if it's already bootstrapped.
      protected class  AddNodeWorkflow.RestoreRedundancy
      The new server is caught up with all data.

      • stateTransfer

        protected void stateTransfer(Set<String> endpoints,
                             CorfuRuntime runtime,
                             Layout.LayoutSegment segment)
                      throws Exception
        Transfer an address segment from a cluster to a set of specified nodes. There are no cluster reconfigurations, hence no epoch change side effects.
        Parameters:
        endpoints - destination nodes
        runtime - The runtime to read the segment from
        segment - segment to transfer
        Throws:
        Exception
